sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
Suppose that 
\[
	\frac{p }{k } = \frac{q }{l } = \frac{r }{m }
\]
Then show that 
\[
	\left(\frac{k ^2 p ^2 + l ^2 q ^2 + m ^2 r ^2}{k ^3 p + l ^3 q + m ^3 r }\right)^{3/2} = \sqrt{\frac{pqr }{klm }}
\]
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
It is given that 
\[
	\frac{p }{k } = \frac{q }{l } = \frac{r }{m } = n \textrm{ assume}
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow p = kn , q = ln , r = mn 
\]"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
Now, left hand side of the equation can be written as 
\[
	\textrm{LHS } = \left(\frac{k ^2 p ^2 + l ^2 q ^2 + m ^2 r ^2}{k ^3 p + l ^3 q + m ^3 r }\right)^{3/2}
\]
\[
	\left(\frac{k ^2 n ^2 k ^2 + l ^2 n ^2 l ^2 + m ^2 n ^2 m ^2}{k ^3 nk + l ^3 nl + m ^3 nm }\right)^{3/2}
\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
\[
	= \left(\frac{n ^2 (k ^4 + l ^4 + m ^4)}{n (k ^4 + l ^4 + m ^4)}\right)^{3/2}
\]
\[
	= 	n ^{3/2}
\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
Now, right hand side of the equation can be written as
\[
	\textrm{RHS } = \sqrt{\frac{pqr }{klm }}
\]
\[
	= \sqrt{\frac{nk . nl . nm }{klm }}
\]
\[
	= n ^{3/2}
\]
"}, {"id": "s5", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
From the above two expressions, we can see that
\[
	\textrm{LHS } = \textrm{ RHS}
\]
Hence proved.
\newline

"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [], "text": "$$\text{{After assumption \frac{p }{k } = \frac{q }{l } = \frac{r }{m } = n and taking terms separately we get $p = kn , q = ln , r = mn $}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{Upon taking LHS, and substituting the value of $p$, $q$, and $r$, in the LHS we get $\left(\frac{k ^2 n ^2 k ^2 + l ^2 n ^2 l ^2 + m ^2 n ^2 m ^2}{k ^3 nk + l ^3 nl + m ^3 nm }\right)^{3/2}$}$$}"}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{Upon further simplification of the previous equation we get $\left(\frac{n ^2 (k ^4 + l ^4 + m ^4)}{n (k ^4 + l ^4 + m ^4)}\right)^{3/2}= 	n ^{3/2}$}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{Upon taking RHS, and substituting the value of $p$, $q$, and $r$, in the RHS we get $\sqrt{\frac{nk . nl . nm }{klm }}= n ^{3/2}}$}"}, {"data": [], "text": " "}]
